channel.title: Post Archive - AtCoder
channel.description: Post Archive - AtCoder - Powered by RSSHub

item.title: AtCoder Heuristic Contest 044 Announcement
item.description:
We will hold <a href="https://atcoder.jp/contests/ahc044">AtCoder Heuristic Contest 044</a>.
- Contest URL: https://atcoder.jp/contests/ahc044 - Start Time: http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?iso=20250316T1900&p1=248 - Duration: 4 hours - Writer: <img src="https://img.atcoder.jp/assets/icon/crown_silver.png"> <a href="https://atcoder.jp/users/square1001?contestType=heuristic" class="username"><span class="user-red">square1001</span></a>, <img src="https://img.atcoder.jp/assets/icon/crown_bronze.png"> <a href="https://atcoder.jp/users/E869120?contestType=heuristic" class="username"><span class="user-orange">E869120</span></a> - Rated range: All (Heuristic Rating)
This contest is one of the qualifying contests for <a href="https://atcoder.jp/posts/1394">AWTF 2026</a>.
We are looking forward to your participation!

item.title: OMRON Corporation Programming Contest 2025 (AtCoder Beginner Contest 397) Announcement
item.description:
We will hold <a href="https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc397">OMRON Corporation Programming Contest 2025 (AtCoder Beginner Contest 397)</a>.
- Contest URL: https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc397 - Start Time: http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?iso=20250315T2100&p1=248 - Duration: 100 minutes - Writer: <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/user/user-orange-1.png" class="user-rating-stage-m"><a href="/users/sotanishy" class="username"><span class="user-orange">sotanishy</span></a>, <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/user/user-orange-1.png" class="user-rating-stage-m"><a href="/users/MtSaka" class="username"><span class="user-orange">MtSaka</span></a>, <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/user/user-orange-1.png" class="user-rating-stage-m"><a href="/users/sounansya" class="username"><span class="user-orange">sounansya</span></a>, <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/user/user-orange-1.png" class="user-rating-stage-m"><a href="/users/kyopro_friends" class="username"><span class="user-orange">kyopro_friends</span></a>, <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/icon/crown_bronze.png"> <a href="/users/blackyuki" class="username"><span class="user-red">blackyuki</span></a> - Tester: <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/user/user-orange-4.png" class="user-rating-stage-m"><a href="/users/mechanicalpenciI" class="username"><span class="user-orange">mechanicalpenciI</span></a>, <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/user/user-orange-4.png" class="user-rating-stage-m"><a href="/users/cn449" class="username"><span class="user-orange">cn449</span></a> - Rated range: ~ 1999 - The point values: 100-250-350-425-475-550-625
We are looking forward to your participation!

item.title: AtCoder Regular Contest 194 (Div. 2) Announcement
item.description:
We will hold <a href="https://atcoder.jp/contests/arc194">AtCoder Regular Contest 194 (Div. 2)</a>.
- Contest URL: https://atcoder.jp/contests/arc194 - Start Time: http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?iso=20250309T2100&p1=248 - Duration: 120 minutes - Number of Tasks: 5 - Writer: <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/user/user-orange-1.png" class="user-rating-stage-m"><a href="/users/leaf1415" class="username"><span class="user-orange">leaf1415</span></a>, <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/user/user-orange-4.png" class="user-rating-stage-m"><a href="/users/mechanicalpenciI" class="username"><span class="user-orange">mechanicalpenciI</span></a>, <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/icon/crown_bronze.png"> <a href="/users/PCTprobability" class="username"><span class="user-red">PCTprobability</span></a> - Tester: <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/user/user-orange-4.png" class="user-rating-stage-m"><a href="/users/Nyaan" class="username"><span class="user-orange">Nyaan</span></a> - Rated range: 1200 ~ 2399
The point values will be 400-600-600-700-900.
We are looking forward to your participation!

item.title: AtCoder Regular Contest 193 (Div. 1) Announcement
item.description:
We will hold <a href="https://atcoder.jp/contests/arc193">AtCoder Regular Contest 193 (Div. 1)</a>.
- Contest URL: https://atcoder.jp/contests/arc193 - Start Time: http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?iso=20250223T2100&p1=248 - Duration: <font color="red">150 minutes</font> - Number of Tasks: 4 - Writer: <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/user/user-orange-1.png" class="user-rating-stage-m"><a href="/users/leaf1415" class="username"><span class="user-orange">leaf1415</span></a> - Tester: <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/user/user-orange-4.png" class="user-rating-stage-m"><a href="/users/Nyaan" class="username"><span class="user-orange">Nyaan</span></a>, <img src="//img.atcoder.jp/assets/icon/crown_bronze.png"> <a href="/users/maspy" class="username"><span class="user-red">maspy</span></a> - Rated range: 1600 ~ 2799
The point values will be 700-800-1000-1000.
We are looking forward to your participation!
02-21 21:00 update: The number of tasks is changed.

item.title: RECRUIT Nihonbashi Half Marathon 2025 Winter（AtCoder Heuristic Contest 043） Announcement
item.description:
We will hold <a href="https://atcoder.jp/contests/ahc043">RECRUIT Nihonbashi Half Marathon 2025 Winter（AtCoder Heuristic Contest 043）</a>.
- Contest URL: https://atcoder.jp/contests/ahc043 - Start Time: http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?iso=20250214T1900&p1=248 - Duration: 10 days - Staff: <a href="https://atcoder.jp/users/cozy_sauna?contestType=heuristic" class="username user-yellow"><span class="user-yellow">cozy_sauna</span></a>, <a href="https://atcoder.jp/users/dpforest" class="username user-blue"><span class="user-blue">dpforest</span></a>, <a href="https://atcoder.jp/users/eha" class="username user-yellow"><span class="user-yellow">eha</span></a>, <a
